title: PAN-101: Add agent attribution badges to Kanban issue cards
description: Main implementation task: Fetch specialists in KanbanBoard, create AgentBadge component, update IssueCard to display which agents are working on each issue. Include conflict warning (slow pulse) when multiple agents on same issue.

comments.author: Eltmon
comments.text:
Implementation complete:
- Added SpecialistAgent type import to KanbanBoard
- Added fetchSpecialists function and useQuery with 5s polling
- Created AgentBadge component with icons and conflict detection
- Updated IssueCardProps to include specialists array
- Updated IssueCard rendering to find specialists by currentIssue
- Replaced model badge with agent attribution badges showing work/planning/specialist agents
- Added slow-pulse animation when multiple agents detected on same issue
- All edge cases from STATE.md handled (no agent, single agent, multiple agents, conflict scenarios)
